name: NPR
text:
A growing list of attendees to a reception for the president's Supreme Court nominee have tested positive for coronavirus.

But on Thursday, Trump suggested he may have been infected the following day — at a reception for families of fallen troops. 
https://t.co/E8ZusfvfcS

name: NPR
text:
A single gunshot. A rising star. A 30-year sentence. When No Limit’s fallen soldier Mac Phipps was accused of murder, his rap dreams became a nightmare. But did he do it?

@louderthanariot uncovers layers of corruption in the Louisiana justice system. https://t.co/Sob4pp14Kd

name: NPR
text:
NEW: The Supreme Court has refused for now to reimpose FDA regulations that require people seeking medication abortion to pick up prescribed pills in-person at a clinic instead of by mail.
https://t.co/aO5pt7Z4du

name: NPR
text: RT @alanawise_: Democrats on Thursday made clear they felt President Trump was at least in part to blame for a thwarted scheme to kidnap the gov of Michigan, citing the president's divisive rhetoric that has often found support among white supremacists and hate groups.  https://t.co/cpdFBmv4Do

name: NPR
text:
NEW: The Trump campaign is calling for next week's presidential debate to be held in person in Miami — despite the organizing commission's decision to hold it virtually "to protect the health and safety of all involved." 
https://t.co/PW1EaeypqY
